2156.「元気玉 小元気玉 超元気玉について| ご説明させていただきます。|<br>|「:
Let me explain about the Genki Dama, Small|Genki Dama, and Super Genki Dama... When you|use any of them, you'll enter a certain|
|period of time, and the experience and gold|you gain will be doubled. Next, let me|explain about the special training balls...|
|It's a mysterious item that doubles the|amount of training stamps you get from|training. However, only the training stamps|
|are doubled, not the experience, gold,|craftsman experience, or fishing|experience... Every Genki Ball can be|
|exchanged for a "Genki Charge" for the time|you've been out of the game... You can|accumulate up to 440 hours of Recharge! Genki|
|Charges are shared across all Adventure|Books... Please note that even if you use|different Adventure Books, you won't be able|
|to recharge while you're adventuring. When|you use each Genki-dama, the Genki Time|starts, but the remaining time does not|
|decrease while you are not adventuring, so|use it well...

|Genki-dama Exchange Service! You can exchange|your Tokkotin Genki-dama in the same way you|exchange your regular Genki-dama... You can|
|exchange Tokkotin Genki-dama for "Genki|Charges", and you can only exchange 40 at a|time... When you use a Tokkun Genki-dama,|
|you'll get 10 minutes of Tokkun Genki Time,|and the Tokkun Stamp you get from training|will double. But only the special training|
|stamps are doubled by the special training|balls... When you use it, your training time|will start, but it won't decrease while|
|you're out of the game, so use it wisely.

2196.「おくりもの受け取りは サポートゴールドや| 各種チケットなどの 支給サービスと:
You can receive support gold, tickets, and|story rewards... Support Gold: Every Friday,|you'll receive Support Gold... Casino Coin|
|Tickets: Every Friday, you'll receive one|coin ticket for use in the casino... Bingo|Tickets Every Friday you will receive 3 bingo|
|tickets for use in casino bingo games...|Casino Play Tickets: Every Friday, you'll|receive 3 Casino Play Tickets for bingo and|
|backgammon... Story Rewards are rewards for|completing quests that you didn't receive...|However, please note that even if you|
|complete the same quest multiple times, you|will only receive one reward... You can|choose when you want to receive the|
|experience you earn for completing stories|and quests... You can either choose to|receive the experience as-is (when you|
|complete the quest), or you can choose to|leave it with us and we'll collect it for|you. However, please note that you can only|
|keep your quest experience the first time you|complete it... Please use this service to|receive your gifts. I hope you find it useful in your|adventures...

2368.「ところで 私ども 旅のコンシェルジュで| 新しいサービスを 始めましたので|:
By the way, I'd like to introduce a new|service we've started here at Travel|Concierge. It's called the "Keep Your|
|Experience" service! You can decide when you|want to receive the experience you get from|completing stories and quests... I'm not sure|
|if this is a good idea or not, but it's a|good idea. You'll be able to receive|experience from storylines and quests|
|whenever you want, so please use this|option... There's no limit to the amount of|experience you can keep, but you can only|
|keep one level of experience in your Orb of|Mastery... Also, once you reach the level|limit, you will not receive any more|
|experience and it will be lost. However,|please note that you must be at least level|15 to use this service...
